select * from ( select sdl.id as dispatch_id,srr.id,srr.report_detail,srr.repair_date,sdl.status,(case sdld.create_id is null when true then -1 else sdld.create_id end) as create_id,srr.create_date from sys_report_repair as srr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl LEFT JOIN sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld on sdld.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id
srr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdl.sys_delete = 1
and sdl.status = 1
and sdl.status in (2,3)
and sdl.status = 4
) as a where a.create_id = -1 or a.create_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

select sdl.id as dispatch_id,srr.id,srr.report_detail,srr.repair_date,sdl.status from sys_report_repair as srr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl,sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld
srr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdld.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdld.operator = #{userId} and sdl.sys_delete = 1
and sdl.status = 2
and sdl.status = 3
and sdl.status = 4
ORDER BY sdl.begin_date DESC

select uao.id,uao.status,concat(cb.no,"幢-",cbu.no,"单元",cbue.room_number) as room_name,ur.name as applicant_name,ur.type as identity,uao.name as article_out_name,uao.expected_time,uao.applicant_date from user_article_out as uao,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,user_resident as ur
uao.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and ur.id = uao.applicant_id
and uao.status = 1
and uao.status = 0
and uao.status in (2,3)
order by uao.applicant_date desc
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status = 1 and sys_delete = 1
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status in (2,3) and sys_delete = 1
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list where status >= 4 and sys_delete = 1
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list as sdl,sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld where sdl.id = sdld.dispatch_list_id and sdl.status = 2 and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and sdld.operator = #{id}
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list as sdl,sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld where sdl.id = sdld.dispatch_list_id and sdl.status = 3 and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and sdld.operator = #{id}
select count(*) from sys_dispatch_list as sdl,sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld where sdl.id = sdld.dispatch_list_id and sdl.status >= 4 and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and sdld.operator = #{id}
select count(*) from user_article_out where status = 1
select count(*) from user_article_out where status >= 2
